00022 #include "broadutil/BroadException.h"
00023 //
00024 #include "broadutil/BroadUtil.h"
00025 //
00026 #include <sstream>
00027 //
00028 
00029 
00030 BroadException::BroadException(const char *msg, const char *sourcefile, size_t sourceline):
00031     m_msg(),
00032     m_sourcefile(),
00033     m_sourceline(sourceline),
00034     m_filename(),
00035     m_errno(0)
00036 {
00037     m_filename[0] = '\0';
00038     safe_strncpy(m_msg, msg, sizeof(m_msg));
00039     safe_strncpy(m_sourcefile, sourcefile, sizeof(m_sourcefile));
00040     formatException();
00041 }
00042 
00043 BroadException::BroadException(const char *msg, const char *sourcefile, size_t sourceline, const char *filename):
00044     m_msg(),
00045     m_sourcefile(),
00046     m_sourceline(sourceline),
00047     m_filename(),
00048     m_errno(0)
00049 {
00050     safe_strncpy(m_msg, msg, sizeof(m_msg));
00051     safe_strncpy(m_sourcefile, sourcefile, sizeof(m_sourcefile));
00052     safe_strncpy(m_filename, filename, sizeof(m_filename));
00053     formatException();
00054 }
00055 
00056 BroadException::BroadException(const char *msg, const char *sourcefile, size_t sourceline, const char *filename, int theErrno):
00057     m_msg(),
00058     m_sourcefile(),
00059     m_sourceline(sourceline),
00060     m_filename(),
00061     m_errno(theErrno)
00062 {
00063     safe_strncpy(m_msg, msg, sizeof(m_msg));
00064     safe_strncpy(m_sourcefile, sourcefile, sizeof(m_sourcefile));
00065     safe_strncpy(m_filename, filename, sizeof(m_filename));
00066     formatException();
00067 }
00068 
00069 void BroadException::report(FILE *fp) 
00070 {
00071     fprintf(fp, "%s\n", m_formattedMsg);
00072 }
00073 
00074 void BroadException::formatException() 
00075 {
00076     const char *errnoStr = "";
00077     if (m_errno != 0) {
00078         errnoStr = strerror(m_errno);
00079     }
00080     std::ostringstream strm;
00081     strm << "ERROR: " << m_sourcefile << ":" << m_sourceline << " " << m_msg << ", file " << m_filename << "; " << errnoStr;
00082     safe_strncpy(m_formattedMsg,  strm.str().c_str(), sizeof(m_formattedMsg));
00083 }
